attributes.action: charge all smokers for health care in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As smoking is such a profound and damaging activity, it seems illogical and unfair on the people that do not smoke and are in perfectly good health, that smokers, who are severely damaging their health and consequently benefiting off free government resources.  This should be a privelage reserved only for respect their, and others', own health, and not abuse the health system.
